[[Image:The Lord of the Rings (Theatrical Editions) (Blu-ray).png|thumb|250px]]
'''The Lord of the Rings: The Motion Picture Trilogy''' is a Blu-ray pack of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film series]] released on April 6, 2010 by [[New Line Cinema]]. It consists of the theatrical editions in high-definition and six DVDs of bonus features, music videos, captions in both Spanish and English, including over an hour of deleted scenes and a documentary about the making of the film (trailers are included).
